Hi, I'm Jess! I like to do stylised portraits, though I do dabble in character and fantasy art from time to time to mix things up!

I just saw an Easter ad so it's time to start reminding people: LILIES ARE DEADLY FOR CATS. The leaves, the petals, the stem, even drinking a bit of vase water or licking a few grains of pollen from their fur can cause fatal kidney failure. ⚠️ www.fda.gov/animal-veter....

✨ I didn't have minthara in my initial playthrough but I have her for my first durge and now I'm a little bit in love with her #bg3 #fanart #bg3art

It’s okay though, I’m not too upset about it, I did honour mode bc I found combat too easy in my first playthrough and I was curious to know if I could do it in honour mode. I found out I out I can, but only when I know what to expect (I had Gale blow himself up last time, so no final fight)
I just lost my honour mode run in the very final battle of the game :’’)

My Patreon is officially out!!! 🥳🎉

I've been dreaming about this moment for many months, never feeling like I was ready, both in skill and commitment, and a year ago it even seemed impossible to get here

It's thanks to all of your support that it's finally real, thank you so much ^^ 💙
discourse/hate. But I never really talked about it with anyone, so I was wondering if you include those instances in your statement?

That being said, I understand why on twitter/bsky people would censor something like an celebrity’s name on a post where they say something negative about them, so it only reaches their followers and not people looking up that name in the search bar, potentially avoiding them a lot of unwanted +

The fact that apparently some people do it on AO3 of all places??? The epitome of “everything is allowed, just make sure people can filter everything to only consume what they want to” ??? Absolutely insane.

Honestly I don’t understand why people do this. I absolutely hate that people “have” to do it (or misspelling) on platforms that sensor those words but here?? You’re actively trying to bypass people’s chosen filters if you censor a potentially triggering word.
I just taught my mum about the AI images plaguing fb. The disbelief when she realised 😅🥲

Artists & Creatives, there's a browser plugin to remove AI sites from your search results. (Good for getting real references.)

Get the plugin here: iorate.github.io/ublacklist/d...
Then add the AI blocklists here: iorate.github.io/ublacklist/s...

🔁 Please Boost 🔁

Make no mistake, there is a race by tech companies to normalize use of gen AI as fast as possible across creative fields, before sensibility within law can coalesce. 

So fight back: reject using it in your workplace; inform friends sharing funny AI image memes; and mock its use to ardent backers.

This is a scream into the void but, I have a request:
Can we please stop calling it “AI art” and call it “AI imagery”?

It is not art. Let’s not give it that legitimacy.
Omg YES PLEASE. “Are they actually annoyed or are they just busy?” “I know I have very low insight so if even I noticed they didn’t like me then they must really hate me” “Or is that overthinking?”

“Sexism is a waste of money” well I’m not surprised but the fact that we need to prove it’s a bad financial move to make things change faster…

For context this was the headline about an article in Nature from last month called “Sexism in academia is bad for science and a waste of public funding”
Hello I haven’t been here in a while how are you
(You distract yourself however you can when you came to the library specifically not to be distracted)

I’m at the library and there’s a book called “Clinically Oriented Anatomy” so now I’m picturing a med student grabbing an anatomy book and going “Wait. This isn’t for medicine. This is for drawing people.”
Ooft. I hadn’t thought about it in a while so naturally I immediately had to go read it (and look at illustrated versions) and now I’m crying again.

I'm noticing more people falling back on Toxic Twitter Traits here on Bluesky lately.

Remember: De-platform hate. Unfollow, Block, and Move on.

Do not amplify assholes with 7 followers with a "gotcha-back" quote-reskeet, and don't screenshot trash unless you're naming names as a warning.

Reminder: these “disclaimers” in an account bio mean, respectively, “the entire purpose of this account is to steal other people’s work” and “we don’t care who they are”. I don’t know why such accounts are allowed here.

Don’t follow or promote content theft accounts. They make the internet worse.

The new Doctor Who episode was great and I’m so happy about it. Such a joy to watch. The entire Noble family was great. And obviously, so was David Tennant. I really like him as the 14th Doctor, although I also can’t wait to get to Ncuti Gatwa

My dnd group is doing an in-character Secret Santa, where we pick presents for each other’s characters. I think it’s amazing. 

I also think it might be weird that I’m having an easier time finding ideas for the characters than I ever do for my real life friends and family 😅😅

Another piece of my tragique sorlock Lamia!

All of my other D&D characters got to go on heroic quests and save the world. Lamia mostly just relived trauma and get closure with her dead husband, her murderer, a formless evil entity, and an ascended god of light (they're all the same guy).
Evidently, I finished this piece one year ago today. I really need to do another full digital painting, soon.
